items.name: Warsilan
items.title2: Master of Management / Master of Management STIE Mahardhika
items.quote: "Studying here helped me understand how to manage organizations more effectively, especially in facing industry dynamics. I felt a tremendous impact on my ability to lead a team and make strategic decisions for the advancement of Pelindo Marine Service."

items.name: Naftali Akawal
items.title1: Deputy Regent of Puncak, Central Papua
items.title2: Master of Management / Master of Management STIE Mahardhika
items.quote: "The Master of Management program I took taught me to become a visionary leader with measurable strategies and deep empathy. As a result, I was able to bring innovation to governance in Central Papua."

items.name: Alvian Erwansyah
items.title1: CEO & Founder PT. Adarma Sagraha Pratama
items.title2: Master of Management STIE Mahardhika & MBA - Oregon State University, USA
items.quote: "STIE Mahardhika Surabaya provided me with a solid foundation in building a company. The modern and practice-based learning approach is highly relevant to current industry needs. Consequently, I was able to develop PT. Adarma Sagraha Pratama into an innovative and highly competitive company."

items.name: Tamsil Ainnur Rizal
items.title1: Director of Oleh Oleh Buah Tangan Batu
items.title2: Master of Management / Master of Management STIE Mahardhika
items.quote: "With STIE Mahardhika's learning approach focusing on innovation and creativity, I was able to develop the Oleh-Oleh Buah Tangan Batu business to become more competitive and sustainable. Studying here truly changed my perspective on business management."
